inclusion.criterion: Actively consuming alcohol within 6 weeks of entry into the study
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Other concomitant causes of liver disease: viral hepatitis, autoimmune liver disease,
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: The patient is a 3-day-old female infant with jaundice that started one day ago. She was born at 34w of gestation and kept in an incubator due to her gestational age.
